ygData.subject: Re: Broken Spells and Quests [Quest Info]
ygData.msgSnippet: I took the letter back to the fellow in the nec guild hall and he gave me the Gate spell.  I still carry the thunder amulet to this day, never did figure out
ygData.messageBody:
I took the letter back to the fellow in the nec guild hall and he gave me
the Gate spell. I still carry the thunder amulet to this day, never did
figure out what to do with it :)

-Gheyla Human Necro [Cazik-Thule]
----- Original Message -----
From: Shadow Panther <shdwpanther@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 12:47 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Broken Spells and Quests



The one I'm a bit peeved about is the Drosco quest the guy in the Qeynos
(actually the Aquaducts) guild area tells you about. You can go in the
conversation up until he says "[compromise the shrines location]." You can
not get the SOB to respond to that phrase no matter how you word it. If you
can prove me wrong, please do so. I finally got Drosco, darn near died
(left over poisen, what a pain), and then had to sweat my way into the
Temple of Thunder to do anything.

What do you do with the Sealed Letter, any of you know?

~Myskyra / Tunare

----- Original Message -----
From: The Baron
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Cc: EQ_Mithaniel_Marr@onelist.com ; eqfeedback@... ;
eqnews@... ; jsmedley@...
Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 10:44 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Broken Spells and Quests



has anyone heard anything about patching the broken spells? Also
the quest where your supposed to get Trumpys Irontoes head is broke, I spent
2 hrs on this quest today, finally killed the dwarf and gated before the
guards got me just to give the head[actually it was meat] to the guildmaster
for him to say "ah your giving me dwarf meat, Thank you", well needless to
say at that point I was about to loose my mind, So I called a GM and told
him about the Spells [Vamp Embrace and Sum Shadows] just for him to say that
he will report it and hopefully it will be addressed in a upcoming
patch.......so in a nut shell were SOL! personally I think we should start
making alot of noise about this, it seems to 989 that making the sun set and
the moon rise is more important than getting our class's spells fixed! also
If you would like the screen shots of the talk I had with this GM I would be
happy to send them to you.....

P.S. Im sure Im gonna get back some feed back from other class's in the
game, all I can say is for you to try to take on 10+ level monsters with a
4th level damage spell and tell me how long you last when you have 3 of them
on you...



Delggath
One
Very Pissed Necomancer
